userStories.name: View category
userStories.description: to list the products or pets that belong to a category

userStories.name: List category
userStories.description: to list the categories available in the system

userStories.name: Get category
userStories.description: to obtain the details of a category by entering its id

userStories.name: Get cart
userStories.description: to obtain the items from the shopping cart

userStories.name: New order
userStories.description: to create a new order from the items selected in the shopping cart

userStories.name: Get order
userStories.description: to obtain the data of an order by its id

userStories.name: Set order id
userStories.description: to obtain and assign a new number or ID of the order

userStories.name: List orders
userStories.description: to list the orders that I have made specifying the username

userStories.name: New account (sign up)
userStories.description: to register in the system providing a username and password

userStories.name: Get account
userStories.description: to obtain my account information in the system by providing my username

userStories.name: Update account
userStories.description: to modify my account data (username or password) in the system

userStories.name: Sign in
userStories.description: to authenticate myself in the system by providing my username and password

userStories.name: Search products
userStories.description: to search for products or pets specifying a name

userStories.name: View product
userStories.description: to see the items of a selected product

userStories.name: Get product
userStories.description: to obtain the details of a product by entering its id

userStories.name: Remove item from cart
userStories.description: to remove an item from the shopping cart

userStories.name: Update cart quantities
userStories.description: to adjust the quantity of an item in the shopping cart

userStories.name: View item (get item)
userStories.description: to see the details of an item, a text or name and a visual description of the item and the number of that item in stock are displayed

userStories.name: Add item to cart
userStories.description: to add an item or item to the shopping cart

userStories.name: Is item in stock
userStories.description: to verify if there are available units of the item or article

userStories.name: Is authenticated
userStories.description: to verify if the user is authenticated in order to create an order, otherwise he must register and authenticate

userStories.name: Sign off
userStories.description: to log out of the system
